text: The Reality TV Star had his account removed after sharing revenge porn images of Chyna in bed with another man and images of her exposed genital area, reports PEOPLE. “ Hahahaha Chyna just sent me this video saying happy 4th of July what a crazy person, ” he captioned the video, which was later removed. “ Come spend time with your daughter instead of f — ing me and then this dude right after. U need help. ” “ This is from Chyna yesterday to me, ” Rob wrote in the caption of the naked photo of Chyna. “ I never been so disrespected in my life. I just bought her 250K of jewelry yesterday.
